front.title: Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) Signaling Extensions for G.709 amendment 3 Optical Transport Networks Control

abstract.t: This document is a companion to the Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) signaling documents. It describes the technology- specific information needed to extend GMPLS signaling to control Optical Transport Networks (OTN) based on ITU-T G.709 amendment 3 reccomandation.
